Taunt[]

Akali drops her kama and twirls her kunai.
  • ▶️   ▶️   ▶️   ▶️   "I can make this fast, or really fast. Choice is yours."
  • ▶️   ▶️   ▶️   ▶️   "Oh, look. Someone's got a death wish."
Taunt Response
  • ▶️   ▶️   "That is just another reason for you to die."

Trivia[]

Akali, the Rogue Assassin
  • ▶️  "Steel beats Rock, Taliyah." references Pokemon, where Rock-type Pokémon are weak to Steel-type attacks.
  • ▶️  "Everyone dies; I just... speed things up." resembles ▶️  "Everybody dies. Some just need a little help".
  • ▶️  "The will comes from within, not from the blade." refers to pre-rework Irelia's title, The Will of the Blade.
  • ▶️   "Deftly I travel. Swiftly you die." references her pre-rework line ▶️   "Deftly I travel."
  • Akali shares quotes with:
    • ▶️   ▶️  "Playtime's over."
Akali, the Fist of Shadow
  • ▶️  "So many noobs... will matchmaking ever find true balance?" references (albeit in a rather tongue-in-cheek fashion) the criticism towards the matchmaking system, often matching up teams of wildly varying levels, causing lower-leveled players to be stomped on by higher-level ones.
    • She was one of the few champions to say "noob", along with Sion, the Undead Champion.
  • ▶️  "Tread lightly." resembles ▶️  "Tread carefully."
Star Guardian Akali
  • ▶️   "'Oh no, I'm shaking in my pretty Star Guardian boots.' Idiot." references Megamind.
  • ▶️   "Not today, Morgana! Not today." is a reference to RuPaul's Drag Race.
    • It also resembles ▶️   "Not today, Caitlyn! Not today!"
  • ▶️   "My friends are my power." most likely references Kingdom Hearts.
  • ▶️   "Bye bye, Sebastien." references Parks and Recreation.
